titles.title: A bill to repeal the provision relating to the treatment of certain technical personnel which was added by section 1706 of the Tax Reform Act of 1986.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/18/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to repeal the provision which disallows the treatment of certain technical personnel as self-employed individuals for employment tax purposes.
